get.description: Retrieve a run for an app in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: wId
parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

post.description: Create and execute a run for an app in the specified workspace.

parameters.name: wId
parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

specification_hash.description: Hash of the app specification. Ensures API compatibility across app iterations.

inputs.description: Array of input objects for the app

stream.description: If true, the response will be streamed

blocking.description: If true, the request will block until the run is complete

block_filter.description: Array of block names to filter the response

200.description: App run created and executed successfully

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

parameters.name: wId
parameters.description: Unique string identifier for the workspace

sId.description: Unique string identifier for the app

savedRun.description: Saved run identifier of the app

dustAPIProjectId.description: ID of the associated Dust API project

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

parameters.name: lastEventId
parameters.description: ID of the last event received

post.description: Create a message in the workspace identified by {wId}.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

post.description: Create a new conversation in the workspace identified by {wId}.

blocking.description: Whether to wait for the agent to generate the initial message (if blocking = false, you will need to use streaming events to get the messages)

visibility.description: The visibility of the conversation (The API only accepts `unlisted`)

get.summary: Retrieve a document from a data source
get.description: Retrieve a document from a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

post.summary: Upsert a document in a data source
post.description: Upsert a document in a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

text.description: The text content of the document to upsert.

source_url.description: The source URL for the document to upsert.

light_document_output.description: If true, a lightweight version of the document will be returned in the response (excluding the text, chunks and vectors). Defaults to false.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden. The data source is managed.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

delete.summary: Delete a document from a data source
delete.description: Delete a document from a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden. The data source is managed.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

items.description: Feature flags enabled for the workspace

email.description: User's email in the current context

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture

versionCreatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the version was created
